safety_flags.evidence: The phrase 'AND NOW OUT OF NO WHERE ON THIS VERY DATE: HUMAN MORPH POWERS' uses excessive capitalization and an unusual sentence structure.
safety_flags.benign_explanation: The author may be attempting to create emphasis or mimic a dramatic announcement style, common in certain types of creative writing or online content.

logical_fallacies.quote: AND NOW OUT OF NO WHERE ON THIS VERY DATE: HUMAN MORPH POWERS
logical_fallacies.correction: The sudden appearance of something does not inherently make it true or valid. Evidence is needed to support the claim.
